text:
Pictures: Forbes Travel Guide's best hotels in Florida Forbes Travel Guide: Best hotels in Florida - Mandarin Oriental, Miami Mandarin Oriental 
Mandarin Oriental, Miami received a five-star rating in the 2017 Forbes Travel Guide. Its spa also received a five-star rating. Its on-site restaurant Azul received a five-star rating. Nearby restaurant NAOE also received a five-star rating. 
Mandarin Oriental, Miami received a five-star rating in the 2017 Forbes Travel Guide. Its spa also received a five-star rating. Its on-site restaurant Azul received a five-star rating. Nearby restaurant NAOE also received a five-star rating. (Mandarin Oriental) Forbes Travel Guide: Best hotels in Florida - Faena Hotel Miami Beach Nik Koenig, Courtesy, Faena Hotel Miami Beach 
Faena Hotel Miami Beach received a five-star rating in the 2017 Forbes Travel Guide. 
Faena Hotel Miami Beach received a five-star rating in the 2017 Forbes Travel Guide. (Nik Koenig, Courtesy, Faena Hotel Miami Beach)
